channel.title: CVE Feed for chromium-browser -- chromium-browser
channel.description: The latest CVEs for chromium-browser -- chromium-browser

item.title: CVE-2016-5202|2024-08-06T00:53:48.686Z -- chromium-browser -- chromium-browser
item.description: browser/extensions/api/dial/dial_registry.cc in Google Chrome before 54.0.2840.98 on macOS, before 54.0.2840.99 on Windows, and before 54.0.2840.100 on Linux neglects to copy a device ID before an erase() call, which causes the erase operation to access data that that erase operation will destroy.
